title: 谁有光影MOD 1.7.2？
txt_content: 谁有光影MOD 1.7.2？  发到我的QQ邮箱：www.740673675@qq.com

replies.author: tteicom
replies.txt_content:
还没出吧，去原贴没看到有下载。。。。。。。

这是原文。。。英文不好。。。机翻的话LZ自己也可以的。。。。

For Minecraft 1.7.2
The required tools (MCP and FML) has just been updated (2013-12-25). 
MCP is in beta but I am not sure about current status of FML. 
It will take some time to update Shaders mod. 
It is possible to make non-FML version but it will take longer time to make an installer or it will be difficult to install, so I will not do that. 
I will not wait for new optifine. The early Shaders mod release for 1.7 will most likely be incompatible with optifine again.
